General.Name: Sanwil Holding SA
General.Description: Sanwil Holding Spólka Akcyjna engages in the production and sale of coated products. The company operates through Coated Products, Financial Services Activities, and Purchase and Sale of Real Estate segments. It also manufactures and sells fabrics for the furniture, footwear, and other industries, such as medical, clothing, and transport. The company operates in Poland, rest of European Union countries, Russia, Ukraine, Belarus. Sanwil Holding Spólka Akcyjna was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Lublin, Poland.

0.Name: Mr. Adam  Buchajski
0.Title: CEO & Pres of the Management Board
